pages.text: Florida Rep is a nonprofit theatre organization dedicated to improving the quality of life in SWFL through first-rate live theatre productions.
Corporate sponsorship of Florida Repertory Theatre provides targeted opportunities to grow your business and to enhance your corporate image.

About Us
.entry-header
“One of America’s Top Repertory Companies!”
The Wall Street Journal
Welcome
to  Florida  Repertory Theatre
Celebrating 28 years of award-winning regional theatre, Florida Repertory Theatre is a fully professional theatre company that the Wall Street Journal called “One of America’s Top Repertory Companies!” Performing in the Historic Arcade Theatre, Florida Rep produces a wide variety of comedies, dramas, and musicals, and brings more than 87,000 people to the Fort Myers River District annually.
Our Mission
Florida Repertory Theatre is committed to providing a first-class regional theatre for Southwest Florida; to creating, nurturing, and developing a diverse ensemble of theatre professionals who will develop long term relationships working on a wide variety of plays; to helping improve the quality of life in our community through all the arts; and to making the arts, especially theatre, accessible to every segment of our community.
Our Theatres
Historic Arcade Theatre
Our Theatres
ArtStage Studio
More
Information
Team
A very important tenet of Florida Rep’s mission is to create, nurture and develop an ensemble of theatre professionals working toward a common goal, and that core belief applies to every member of our staff.
Learn More
Plan Your Visit
Performing in the Historic Arcade Theatre, Florida Repertory Theatre is in the heart of the Fort Myers River District on Bay Street between Jackson and Hendry Streets. For tips on directions and parking, where to dine, where to stay, and where to play, visit our guide.
Learn More
Support
Florida Rep
Individual Giving
As a nonprofit professional theatre serving Southwest Florida, Florida Rep relies on the generosity of its patrons who donate funds for each production and program.
Learn More
Sponsorships
When you make a philanthropic commitment of $15,000 or more, your name will be noted in signage, Playbill and website pages dedicated to Grand Season Sponsorship. You will also receive benefits associated with your donation commitment level.
Learn More
Volunteer
Florida Rep’s Core of Volunteers, The Scene Stealers, are needed to assist in a number of different capacities, and the opportunities are virtually endless.
Learn More
Leave a review

Florida Repertory Theatre is committed to providing a first-class regional theatre for Southwest Florida.
Our Board of Directors works very hard to ensure quality performances and exceptional experiences.
Contact Florida Repertory Theatre today. Our staff can assist with a variety of questions.
We have an amazing and hardworking group of staff members dedicated to making your experience the best possible!
